tool_description: The Gaze Detection API is used to monitor a direction where a person is looking.
name: Eye Tracking and Gaze Detection
title: Eye Tracking and Gaze Detection

api_list.name: Eye tracking for image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://eye-tracking-and-gaze-detection.p.rapidapi.com/gaze-detection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "eye-tracking-and-gaze-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://eye-tracking-and-gaze-detection.p.rapidapi.com/gaze-detection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "eye-tracking-and-gaze-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
